Springfield.Naismith Memorial Basketball Hall of Fam: The Naismith Memorial Basketball Hall of Fame is an American history museum and hall of fame, located at 1000 Hall of Fame Avenue in Springfield, Massachusetts. It serves as the sport's most complete library, in addition to promoting and preserving the history of basketball. Dedicated to Canadian - American physician and inventor of the sport James Naismith, it was opened and inducted its first class in 1959.
